title: Shaq's Fun House Bringing John Summit and Carnival Mayhem to Super Bowl Weekend
description: The annual event continues its tradition of blending music, carnival thrills and over-the-top entertainment.
author: Cameron Sunkel
excerpt: The annual event continues its tradition of blending music, carnival thrills and over-the-top entertainment.

html:
The annual event continues its tradition of blending music, carnival thrills and over-the-top entertainment.

The annual event continues its tradition of blending music, carnival thrills and over-the-top entertainment.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

When John Summit steps behind the decks at Shaq's Fun House, The Big Easy might just vibrate off the map. On February 7th, Mardi Gras World in New Orleans will morph into an all-night playground as Shaquille O’Neal's larger-than-life vision takes center stage on the eve of Super Bowl LIX.

The Super Bowl might be the main attraction, but Shaq’s Fun House ensures the party starts long before kickoff. And with Summit joining the festivities, this year’s installment promises to raise the bar on entertainment during Big Game Weekend. The house music superstar is joined on the bill by Ludacris as well as the father-and-son duo of Shaquille and Myles O'Neal.

Many are speculating that the event could be where Shaq, also known as DJ Diesel, and Summit finally meet behind the decks for a collaborative set. An exchange on X hinted at the possibility last fall.

While the NFL’s elite will take to the field on February 9th, the true MVP of the weekend might just be Shaq himself. His consistent ability to unite the worlds of sports and music has made the Fun House event a cornerstone of Super Bowl festivities year after year.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

Much like its charismatic host, Shaq's Fun House is anything but ordinary. Part music festival, part carnival and part culinary delight, it’s a one-of-a-kind experience. For those seeking more than music, the lineup includes performance art, carnival games and a six-hour open bar, all wrapped in the vibrant energy of New Orleans.

Tickets to Shaq's Fun House go on sale Friday, December 13th at 10am CST.
